title: Fonts
description: Each array of fonts creates a priority-based order. The first font in the array should be the ideal font, followed by sensible, web-safe fallbacks

items.name: Display
items.description: The primary font for display text (eg. primary headings, pullquotes).

items.name: Body
items.description: The global font for body copy.

items.name: Secondary
items.description: Used for accent copy (eg. eyebrow headings, captions)
